title: College Bribery Plot, Mitt Romney's Birthday Candles & Celebrating Fiendish Women | Padma Lakshmi
itunes:title: College Bribery Plot, Mitt Romney's Birthday Candles & Celebrating Fiendish Women | Padma Lakshmi
description:
Dozens are implicated in a college bribery scheme, Desi Lydic honors villainous women, and "Top Chef" host and executive producer Padma Lakshmi chats with Trevor.
